item.title: Proving Theorems Recursively
item.description: POETRY: a recursive neural theorem prover achieving 5.1% higher success rate and solving substantially longer proofs.

item.title: Randomized Sparse Matrix Compression for Large-Scale Constrained Optimization in Cancer Radiotherapy
item.description: Randomized sparse matrix compression boosts large-scale cancer radiotherapy optimization, improving treatment quality without sacrificing speed.

item.title: What do Graph Neural Networks learn? Insights from Tropical Geometry
item.description: Using tropical geometry, researchers reveal that ReLU-activated message-passing GNNs learn continuous piecewise linear functions, highlighting their expressivity limits and paving the way for enhanced…
